commands.name: /fill
commands.description: Replace a color with another color

args.name: ignoreMaterials
args.description: Ignore material of brick when filling

commands.name: /fillGet
commands.description: The color you want to replace, pull out paint tool and choose a color then type the command.

commands.name: /fillSet
commands.description: The color you want to set, pull out paint tool and choose a color then type the command.
